code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import Axios from"axios";import{connect}from"react-redux";import RecipeCard from"../../components/recipeCard/recipeCard";import"./savedRecipesPage.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SavedRecipesPage=_ref=>{let{username}=_ref;const[recipeList,setRecipeList]=useState([]);const getRecipes=()=>{Axios.post("http://localhost:3001/getrecipes",{username:username}).then(response=>{setRecipeList(response.data);});};useEffect(()=>{getRecipes();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Saved Recipes",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tiles",children:recipeList.length>0&&recipeList.map((element,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RecipeCard,{id:element.id,title:element.title,url:element.url,image:element.image},i))})]});};const mapStateToProps=state=>({username:state.username});export default connect(mapStateToProps)(SavedRecipesPage);
